attributes.action: outlaw the unnecessary and outmoded practice of late-night strongman competitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call upon the Government to make it a criminal offence in the United Kingdom to either host or be in attendance at a late-night strongman competition. Such events have no place in Britain in 2007 and serve only as an unwelcome anachronism.
